lead_paragraph: African soccer officials will decide on Friday which of FIFA's presidential candidates they will back as the campaign to replace Sepp Blatter at the helm of the sport's troubled ruling body reaches the home straight.

headline.print_headline: Africa Vote Could Hold Key to FIFA Presidential Election
headline.main: Africa Vote Could Hold Key to FIFA Presidential Election

snippet: African soccer officials will decide on Friday which of FIFA's presidential candidates they will back as the campaign to replace Sepp Blatter at the helm of the sport's troubled ruling body reaches the home straight....
